General.Name: Bullet Exploration Inc
General.Description: Bullet Exploration Inc. engages in the acquisition and exploration of mineral property assets in Canada. It had the right and option to acquire an 100% interest in the Copper Canyon property located in Nicola Mining Division of the Province of British Columbia. The company is based in Burnaby, Canada.
General.Address: 4500 - 5th Street north east, Calgary, AB, Canada, T2E 7C3
